attributes.action: Knighthoods for Harry Patch,Bill Stone and Henry Allingham.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it is time that these men, our last remaining survivors of the first world war be made knights in honour of all those who did not survive fighting for this country and the commonwealth.They the above represent each of the fighting arms of the forces.It should be done before it is to late.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.honours.gov.uk/
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
